text: Jeff Spear (born June 28, 1988) is an American sabre fencer. He competed in the men's team sabre competition at the 2012 Summer Olympics. Spear graduated from Columbia University in 2010. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American male fencers Category:American sabre fencers Category:Olympic fencers of the United States Category:Fencers at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Albany, New York Category:Pan American Games medalists in fencing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Fencers at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Columbia Lions fencers
title: Jeff Spear
